trans-unit.source: Specifies whether view-state information is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 指定了是否加密檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The ViewStateEncryptionMode enumeration provides values for specifying whether the view-state information in a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: ViewStateEncryptionMode 列舉型別提供值，指定是否在檢視狀態資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>物件已加密。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: The ViewStateEncryptionMode value can be set only in the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive or in the section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 只在中，可以設定 ViewStateEncryptionMode 值[@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指示詞或組態檔的區段中。

trans-unit.source: The view-state information is always encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 永遠加密的檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The view-state information is encrypted if a control requests encryption by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption*> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項藉由呼叫要求加密，加密的檢視狀態資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption*>

trans-unit.source: The view-state information is never encrypted, even if a control requests it.
trans-unit.target: 檢視狀態資訊永遠不會加密，即使控制項要求。
